newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: BRAMBLES UP ON CHEP, GKN RESULTS.
newsitem.headline: BRAMBLES UP ON CHEP, GKN RESULTS.

text.p: Shares in Brambles Industries Ltd hit a record high in early trading on Thursday following the overnight release of results by GKN Plc, its partner in the Chep pallet business in the United States.
At 10.40 a.m. (0040 GMT), Brambles shares were 82 cents or 2.93 percent higher at A$28.80 with about 29,000 shares traded.
"The Chep results were very good. There were some positive comments about the result and the profit margins on Chep look very good," said one Sydney-based broker.
GKN said in London on Wednesday that the Chep profit grew 31 percent at constant exchange rates.
"It's all systems go for Chep. It looks like there could be upgrades for Brambles on the back of this," said the broker.
Brambles is expected to report its results for the year to June 30 later this month.
